commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yes, I would much appreciate it if you could kindly consider volunteering. We need your help, please!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Sigh* Are we really going to be able to gather enough volunteers by the deadline at this rate?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nope, this isn't the time to lose confidence, I gotta focus in all of my energy right now. If I don't, I risk crushing everyone's dreams. That's the last thing I want to do.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: After what I said to Ayumu, I need to come up with some results now or I won't be able to show my face around her.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I don't think I said anything wrong, but I could've worded it better. I didn't catch a look at her reaction... Is she going to practice as usual?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Maybe I should go and see how she's doing... Yeah, I'm gonna do just that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey everyone!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh my gosh! You finally came to see us!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Heya! You been holding up all right? Wait, you don't look too hot!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: She's right. You look like a shadow of your former self. Have you been eating and sleeping properly?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* I'm fine.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You don't look fine. Knowing you, I bet you've been pushing yourself too hard, huh? It's great you're giving it your all, but it'll all be pointless if you run yourself flat.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It's important to give yourself some rest every so often. Isn't that what you're always saying to us?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Guess I've got no choice but to cook you up an energy-boosting, nutrient-packed, stick-to-your-ribs meal next time!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks, everyone.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Um, you have come to watch us practice today, right? All of us have so much we would like to discuss with you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, I'm sorry. I still have a whole lot of people I need to get in contact with; I'm just dropping by for a bit today. Um, is Ayumu around?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: She's not here today.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What? Have you heard from her?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No. She has not been responding to any calls or messages.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We tried going to her classroom, but she apparently left right after homeroom finished up.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: We thought she might've been feeling under the weather so we checked out the nurse's office, but she wasn't there.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Today's nice and warm, so I wouldn't have any room to talk if I caught her napping somewhere. *Yawn* Now I'm starting to get all sleepy myself.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It's hard to even imagine it, but do you think she might just be skipping out on us?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: We're not talking about Kasumi here. Ayumu wouldn't ever skip practice.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, you're right.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whoa, hey! I don't skip practice either!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: We're worried about her too. Do you know what's going on?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um... Well...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Looks like you do. All right, 'fess up.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The truth is...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I see. So that's what happened.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Now is the time when I really have to give it my all, especially to make the School Idol Festival a reality, so I might have been a bit too blunt...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hmm, it sounds like she did take what you said badly then.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But I don't think what you said was wrong, though!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I understand how Ayumu feels...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I think I do, too.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: But you're also right about not being able to do anything if you're half-hearted and allow yourself the option of giving up.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yeah, I think it's important to keep your eyes on your vision. If you feel even the tiniest bit swayed towards giving in, then that will end up pulling you in unintentionally.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: There are times when you have to give it everything you've got, and I think now is one of those times. That's when you have to try your best, no matter how sleepy you are.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You guys...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: This is a really difficult problem. I can see both sides here. However, I personally have not felt very excited for practice lately.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, I've been distracted.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I think I can relate to that. It's like I've got doubts about whether it's okay to practice without someone watching over us.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I've also felt worried at times. I wanted to ask for your advice, but I also didn't want to get in your way.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm so sorry, everyone! I haven't been paying any of you any attention and I've been putting it down to being busy. So that's how you all felt? I'm so, so sorry.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We all completely understand that you're only acting in our best interests. However, I believe that we need you by our side.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'm sure Ayumu feels the same way, too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I told myself and everyone that I was doing this for all of you, but I just made you worry... I really feel so stupid.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You don't have to apologize.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: She's right. Right now, I think it's more important to have a constructive conversation about what we'll do from here on out.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: From here on out, huh? Yeah, you're right.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Come to think of it, I met up with Honoka and Chika the other day.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They wanted Nijigasaki's school idols to be the opening act for the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: What?! You mean on the main stage? That's a pretty big deal, isn't it?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Leave 's and Aqours out and have us open the festival? That's huge...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But I guess it's just proof of our amazing talent! After all, my cuteness just can't be beat!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Sounds good to me. I'm getting chills thinking about it.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I can feel some kind of power brewing inside of me!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: In order for us to be the opening act, we must first turn our attention back to gathering volunteers!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yep, let's all work together on this!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We should go and tell Ayumu right away!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm sure she'll perk up as well after hearing this.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Absolutely! Maybe she couldn't show up today because she felt too awkward about things, but let's go and see her tomorrow!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: All right, so starting today, let's split up ALL of the things you've been doing and we can each take a share. That'll help put Ayumu's mind at ease as well.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But you guys need to practice if you're gonna be the opening act.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: It's not good for you to carry the burden of everything all on your own. You need to rely on us every now and then.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: She's right. We're all members of the same group, after all!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Trying times should be overcome by working as one. Let's all combine our efforts to get the volunteers we need!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks, you guys.
